channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Big Short’s Michael Burry takes on the Big Tech bulls, but holds fire on this cult favorite.
item.description: Burry is betting against Nvidia and Palantir shares

item.title: ‘We never want to think our children would strip us of all our money’: Is it safe to give my kids my Social Security number?
item.description: “Regrettably, I have a good friend whose brother robbed their mother of a significant amount of money before her death.”

item.title: ‘Today’ host Jason Kennedy sells his renovated Agoura Hills home for $3.9 million in 45 days
item.description: Jason Kennedy, of NBC’s “Today” show, has found a buyer for his sprawling property in the Santa Monica Mountains in Los Angeles County.

item.title: Why 2026 could be a banner year for regional-bank stocks
item.description: A steepening yield curve, a looser regulatory environment and increasing M&A activity all bode well, according to Catherine Mealor of KBW.

item.title: Former Celtics star Jrue Holiday sells his Boston mansion for $6.69 million
item.description: Months after he was traded to the Portland Trail Blazers, Holiday has finalized the sale of his Boston home.

item.title: Wednesday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 slipped for a third consecutive trading session as the end of 2025 approached.

item.title: The four pillars for a 2026 rally, according to one trader
item.description: These factors can make or break the bull market next year.

item.title: Mike Santoli's long-time 'Mystery Broker' is revealed, says bull run 'going to end' within two years
item.description: "Mystery Broker" joined CNBC's Michael Santoli on "Closing Bell" Tuesday, where MB's identity was revealed to be David Snyder.

item.title: A tech analyst listed his favorite internet stocks for 2026. Here's what he picked
item.description: Mark Mahaney, head of the firm's internet research team, shared his top picks in both the large and small/mid-cap spaces.

item.title: These stocks had big turnarounds in 2025. Where analysts see them heading in 2026
item.description: Advanced Micro Devices and CVS Health are two stocks that recovered in 2025 and could still have more room to run higher.
